frontmatter.title: The WEIRDest People in the World

node.excerpt:
The WEIRDest People in the World was a really great book. I don't have much of a
review to write at the moment, but I highly recommend it.

I listen to the A16Z podcasts and one of them is One on One with A and Z which is pretty good. I
think it is just recording a Clubhouse show…
